channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: Health Ministry Proposes Making Taiwan First in Asia To Legalize Surrogacy
item.description: Taiwan's health ministry has proposed changes to artificial reproduction laws that would make the country the first in Asia to legalize surrogacy. The proposal would also extend ac

item.title: Greenpeace Says Taiwan's Coastal Scenic Areas Are Under Threat
item.description: Greenpeace says human activity is threatenings some of Taiwan's most popular coastal scenic areas.

item.title: How Tsai's 'New Southbound Policy' Forged Regional Ties Beyond Trade
item.description: President Tsai Ing-wen's signature "New Southbound Policy" expanded Taiwan's scope for regional partnerships beyond trade, including collaborations in firefighting and emergency re

item.title: China Ramps Up Cyberattacks Against Taiwan Ahead of Lai Inauguration
item.description: China is ramping up its cyberattacks days before Lai Ching-te is sworn in as Taiwan's new president, according to security officials.
